mapper.select: select opinionNO, eduNo, goodsNo, userNo, ID, opinionName, opinionContent, opinionDate, opinionSecret, opinionPwd, opinionStatus, opinionScore, answerNo from (select rownum n, opinionNO, eduNo, goodsNo, userNo, ID, opinionName, opinionContent, opinionDate, opinionSecret, opinionPwd, opinionStatus, opinionScore, answerNo from (select * from opinion order by opinionNO desc))a where a.n between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update opinion set opinionName=#{opinionName},opinionContent=#{opinionContent},opinionSecret=#{opinionSecret},opinionStatus=#{opinionStatus} where opinionNO=#{opinionNO} and opinionPwd=#{opinionPwd}
mapper.delete: delete opinion where opinionNO = #{opinionNO} and opinionPwd = #{opinionPwd}
mapper.select: select opinionName, opinionContent, opinionDate,opinionSecret, opinionPwd, opinionStatus from opinion where goodsNo=#{goodsNo} and type='opinion' order by opinionDate desc
select opinionName, opinionContent, opinionDate,opinionSecret, opinionPwd, opinionStatus from opinion where goodsNo=#{goodsNo} and type='review' order by opinionDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into opinion(opinionNo, eduNo, goodsNo, lecNo, id, opinionName, opinionContent, opinionDate, opinionSecret, opinionPwd, opinionStatus, reviewScore, answerNo, type) values (seq_opinion.nextVal,#{eduNo jdbcType=INTEGER},#{goodsNo},#{lecNo jdbcType=INTEGER},#{id},#{opinionName},#{opinionContent},sysdate,#{opinionSecret jdbcType=INTEGER},#{opinionPwd jdbcType=VARCHAR},'접수',#{reviewScore jdbcType=INTEGER},#{answerNo jdbcType=INTEGER},#{type})
